description: Non-Material Amendment Application (S96A) to vary Conditions 2 (Approved Plans) and 3 (External Materials) of planning permission reference 78801/APP/2024/1365, dated 06-08-2024, for the 'Erection of canopy porch to the rear and an outbuilding to the side.' Amendment seeking to alter the porch from a hipped roof to a gable end roof and to amend the approved development's external materials.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 78801/APP/2024/1365, dated 06-08-2024, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the Drawing Nos:
KA2317 - 01 (Site Location Plan)
KA2317 - 04 - Rev - C (Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations)
KA2317 - 07 - Rev - B (Proposed Block Plan)
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
REASON
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).
Condition 3 (Materials) of planning permission reference 78801/APP/2024/1365, dated 06-08-2024, is amended to:
The external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall be constructed with the materials detailed on drawing reference KA2317 - 04 - Rev - C (Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations).
REASON

To safeguard the visual amenities of the surrounding area and to ensure that the proposed development does not have an adverse effect upon the appearance of the existing building in accordance with Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2 and 3, which are superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 78801/APP/2024/1365, dated 06-08-2024, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been SUPERSEDED:
KA2317 - 04 - Rev - A (Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations)
KA2317 - 07 - Rev - A (Proposed Block Plan)
The following plans have been APPROVED:
KA2317 - 01 (Site Location Plan)
KA2317 - 04 - Rev - C (Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations)
KA2317 - 07 - Rev - B (Proposed Block Plan)
